attributes.action: The elderly do not have to sell their property or use their saving to buy care.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the present time those elderly requiring to go into a care home must sell their property or use their savings to buy care. Those elderly that have not shown prudence get their care by using a proportion of their pension otherwise care is free.
This is unfair on those elderly that have shown prudence and bought their home and managed to safe. The circle should now be closed and care should be free for the Elderly without having to sell their property or use their saving. Elderly care is free in Scotland why not England and Wales.
